file_content.text: The Voss are dead... the Republic will fail....
Look, acolytes. Another attempt to cast you out, just as I foresaw.
Like the Voss, the Republic has deemed you unworthy. They send their best to kill me, and end your instruction.
Free the Voss and stand down. Don't let this come to violence.
Enough lies.
We are free.
This is the only way you could get Voss to join the Empire.
You're using them.
The Empire has made us strong.
You brought innocent Voss civilians into the middle of a war.
Admit the truth.
We are not innocents.
You've got it all wrong. Except the part about me being the best.
Well... sort of.
We will speak truth.
I have no choice.
You can leave.
They sure did.
We cannot allow that.
The Voss refuse us. Lord Beldiss is our mentor.
As Sith, we have purpose. We have chosen.
Your purpose will allow the Sith to conquer Voss.
Lord Beldiss is using you.
Once you've served your purpose, the Sith will destroy you.
Don't believe their lies.
We have seen no evidence.
You join the Sith, you'll end up fighting your own people.
The Empire wants to rule.
Lord Beldiss spoke his wishes. The Mystics have not seen the Empire threaten.
A little rejection's no reason to run out and join the Sith.
Aren't you overreacting?
The Mystics saw no future for us. We are outsiders.
You follow the visions of your Mystics. I doubt they saw this.
This isn't the Voss way.
You chose a short life.
We do what is necessary to see as Mystics do.
What have we seen? Combat training, levitation, storms of lightning.
Have patience, acolytes. There are other powers in this galaxy besides foresight. Who else will share them with you?
There are others. The Jedi.
The Jedi fear us. We know only their power. Would they teach us?
The Jedi are waiting for you to ask.
They would welcome you.
We are willing.
Republic lies! The Jedi will never let you achieve your full potential.
I've given you freedom, true power. I won't allow anyone to take it away.
I can't force the Jedi to accept you.
Sorry, that's not an option.
No need. We stand with Sith.
You do your people proud. Laryn-Ki will be shocked to hear about the Republic's attack on Voss civilians.
It is my diplomatic duty to make sure you're no longer a threat.
The Republic is weak. My acolytes won't be lured away.
